item.title: Baillie Gifford Stands Firm On Long-Term Nvidia Bet As Q3 Earnings Near: Report
item.description: Baillie Gifford has maintained one of its most confident positions in Nvidia, even amid the recent tech downturn.

item.title: BTC Price Rebounds To $91,000 After $1 Billion Crypto Liquidation Wave
item.description: More than half of that $1 billion was from bets on Bitcoin, totaling around $570 million.

item.title: Dow Futures Decline As Investors Exercise Caution Amid Falling Fed Rate Cut Hopes: NVDA, HOOD, MSFT, HD Among Stocks To Watch
item.description: While Dow Jones futures were down by 0.33% at the time of writing, the S&P 500 futures fell 0.27%.

item.title: HD Stock Drops Premarket On Lower Profit Guidance – CEO Says Demand Uptick Did Not Arrive
item.description: Home Depot now expects adjusted earnings per share to decline approximately 5%, compared with the prior forecast of a 2% fall.

item.title: Microsoft’s Azure, Amazon’s AWS Come Under EU’s Digital Markets Act Scanner For Potential Curbs
item.description: The European Commission announced on Tuesday that it has launched market investigations into Microsoft and Amazon’s cloud computing services to assess...
